root.message: The ADJUSTMENT field for indicator 2-2-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: Data on mean haemoglobin and anaemia prevalence from high-altitude countries that were not adjusted for altitude when published were adjusted for altitude by WHO, as described in Stevens et al (2013). The Bayesian hierarchical mixture internally adjusts summary statistics computed with non-standard haemoglobin cutoffs to match the standard WHO cutoffs listed above.
